alluxio.resource

Interface Pool<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of resource this pool manages
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicResourcePool, NettyChannelPool, ThriftClientPool

    public interface Pool<T>
    Interface representing a pool of resources to be temporarily used and returned.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T acquire()
      Acquires a resource from the pool.
      T acquire(long time, TimeUnit unit)
      Acquires a resource from the pool.
      void close()
      Closes the pool which clears all the resources.
      void release(T resource)
      Releases the resource to the pool.
      int size() 

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        T acquire()
   throws Exception
        Acquires a resource from the pool.
        Returns:
        the acquired resource which should not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if it fails

      • acquire

        T acquire(long time,
          TimeUnit unit)
   throws Exception
        Acquires a resource from the pool.
        Parameters:
        time - time it takes before timeout if no resource is available
        unit - the unit of the time
        Returns:
        the acquired resource which should not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if it fails

      • release

        void release(T resource)
        Releases the resource to the pool.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to release

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the pool which clears all the resources.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        the current pool size
